question: What is the name of the indigenous anti-torpedo decoy system, that has been induced by the Indian Navy?
explanation:
The Indian Navy has recently inducted an advanced anti-torpedo decoy system called ‘Maareech’, that has been designed and developed indigenously by the Defence Research and Development Organization (DRDO).
The decoy system is capable of being fired from all frontline ships and it is capable of detecting and neutralizing incoming torpedo. As per the Navy, the prototype has successfully completed all evaluation trials. Defence PSU Bharat Electronics Limited, would undertake the production of this decoy system.
